ielts.title: What is IELTS and why is it important?
ielts.description: IELTS ‚Äî International English Language Testing System ‚Äî is an exam that tests your English proficiency. It is essential for studying, working, or immigrating to English-speaking countries.

aboutUsTagline: Silkway Global is your trusted guide to the world of knowledge and experiences.
experience: For over 10 years, we have been organizing unforgettable vacations for children.
programs: Our programs combine learning, development, and safety.

1.text: We were looking for a course where our son would not only learn but also enjoy himself. In your lessons, he started speaking English with confidence and began watching movies without subtitles! Huge thanks to the teachers for their approach and support.
1.author: Serik Kabanbay

2.text: My son started learning English from scratch, and I see how quickly he is progressing.
2.author: Serik Kabanbay

3.text: Thank you for your attention to each student!
3.author: Saniya Abay

6.text: We were looking for a serious course for our son to prepare him for an international program. The teachers not only explain things clearly but also inspire him. Progress was noticeable in just three weeks.
6.author: Saniya Abay

7.text: The courses are modern, everything is explained simply, and most importantly ‚Äî the teachers know how to engage the students. He is already speaking with confidence!
7.author: Saniya Abay
